post.content:
The following is the summary of what was discussed about the configuration component. Please review, correct, ask any questions you may have, and throw in your ideas.

1) Namespace: FileGate.Config

2) DLL name: fgatecfg.dll

3) Error code range: 40000 - 49999

4) Capabilities:
  - maintain global/local configuration parameter values
  - provide API for accessing configuration parameter values
  - << the list will grow up as we go>>

5) Configuration parameters
  - a flag indicating whether or not to replicate/backup system files
  - pooling interval for checking target (to-be-replicated) files modification status
  - source folder URIs that require replication/backup
  - file extensions that requre replication/backup
  - destination folder URIs that require synchronization with the above source folders
  - network timeout before giving up a connection to the destination peer
  -<< this list should grow up, please add yours here>>

end.
